experience: You and Vincent both know Eric Keosky-Smith, Curtis Gunn, and 116 others
This company will do for law firms what SalesForce did for sales reps.
If Artificial Intelligence is of interest to you, please read my new article on this important topic for entrepreneurs…

Algorithms run by artificial intelligence are all around us. They're benefitting both businesses and their customers every day. The savvy entrepreneur needs to learn about this opportunity for their business, and my blog post helps you do it…

Serpico DEV provides fully-managed, outsourced application software development. Implementing a unique blend of on-site business analysis, architecting and project management and off-site application development, Serpico DEV delivers world-class agile software development at near-shore development rates. Specializing in prototypes, start-ups and early stage projects, Serpico DEV works closely with your stakeholders to deliver your vision on-time and within-budget.

Task Messenger helps you assign and track day-to-day activities. It has everything you'd expect from a robust task management system, yet is as simple to use as text messaging. No heavy footprint and no learning curve means employees will actually use it. Task Messenger will notify you of your task's status so you don't have to waste time following up. Task Messenger is the world's only 100% mobile "Task Messaging" solution.

We're the foremost experts on selling time. There's a proven direct correlation between the amount of time spent on actual selling activities and results. But independent research shows that the average salesperson spends only about a third of their time on actual selling. Why? Because time robbers like company meetings, reports and other demands steal time. Armed with our proprietary technology, our experts develop a true picture and an actionable plan that is proven to drive selling time back up, then assist our clients with implementation and follow-through so real, enduring change takes place.

Spotlight is a communication and task management platform for the distributed workforce. Using the most effective principles of social media based networking and Agile task management, Spotlight provides a highly collaborative, effective and engaging system for distributed teams to manage projects and tasks from anywhere, any time, on any device.

Led development team build a variety of software solutions for Trivantis.  Led remote developers from California to Florida and south of the border in Mexico and Argentina. Worked very closely with executive team and CEO to define software solutions that best met company goals. Consistently met or beat deadlines and expectations.

I have known Vincent for over 5 years now, as both a service provider and as a customer.  In both cases Vincent was the consummate professional and subject matter expert!  When I needed help in evaluating some software I had inherited I didn't hesitate to call Vincent.  Vincent quickly went to work, found several weaknesses that had gone undiscovered, but he also identified some strengths.  He performed this analysis with a high level of professionalism and insight, allowing me to make a quality business decision that is driving the future of this software product to this day.  In addition to Vincent's formidable skills as an business analyst and architect, he also has done an incredible job in choosing the right technical folks to be on his "bus".  His hand picking of his team has resulted in a very efficient and effective team.  I used Vincent to help me choose some of my own development team and his screening skills are exceptional.  Net...I would recommend Vincent and his development team for any software development project, in any industry, at any time!

As the owner of a company that does online writing training, I’ve spent money on programs that were costly, difficult to maintain, and expensive to make changes to. A colleague recommended that I try Flypaper. I was able to easily convert PowerPoint and other presentations to the Flypaper platform, and ended up with professional-looking presentations that I could change, expand, or modify without any added cost. Best of all, Flypaper has allowed me to expand my repertoire of online training with little effort. And unlike so many service companies, the customer service at Flypaper is unbelievable! They’ve answered my questions, helped me problem-solve, and solved any issues quickly and accurately. I highly recommend this program!

summary: Vincent Serpico has worked in software development for over 15 years. After graduating Cum Laude with honors from Florida International University with a degree in Computer Science, he began his career as a software engineer and progressed to VP of Product development at Flypaper Inc and then Trivantis Corporation. Entrepreneurship is near and dear to Serpico’s heart. As such, after leaving Trivantis, Serpico started a near-shore software development company that specializes in early stage projects where he can help entrepreneurs realize their vision. Starting with just 1 developer and himself, SerpicoDEV now has over 3 dozen people on staff, and caters to early stage mobile and web applications. While running SerpicoDEV, it become necessary to manage dozens of near-shore resources remotely. Serpico created a web and mobile application to specifically manage remote developers, called Spotlight. The application worked so well, Serpico spun it off as a separate company and raised capital to help it grow. Spotlight has recently gone through a major pivot and attracted new talent and funding. Serpico serves at CTO of Spotlight and SalesFitRx, while maintaining his CEO position at SerpicoDEV.  Specialties: Launching Projects – Adept at initiating long term projects; delivering measurable results in staged phasesTeam Building – Hiring, retaining, motivating and team buildingSoftware Architecture – Architecting large scale business applications; designing and integrating multiple projectsProduct Development and Stratgey - Highly skilled and expericned at designing software, and implement staged relases to match business goals. Emerging Technologies – Evaluating new technologies and their impactAgile Project Management – Planning, managing and executing projects on tight and aggressive deadlines
name: Vincent Serpico
title: Embracing Self-Learning Algorithms
